Z

zoomIn() - Method in class com.defano.jmonet.tools.MagnifierTool
Multiplies the scale of the canvas this tool is currently active on by the value returned from getMagnificationStep().
zoomOut() - Method in class com.defano.jmonet.tools.MagnifierTool
Divides the scale of the canvas this tool is currently active on by the value returned from getMagnificationStep().
